SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface Arc

public interface Arc

Interface that provides arc information.
Arc information is obtained from link declaration information.

Field Summary

          Constant that indicates that "none" is set as an actuate attribute value.

Method Detail

getParent

public XLinkDeclaration getParent()
Link declaration information to which arc information belongs is obtained.
Returns:
The link declaration information is returned.

getDefinition

public Node getDefinition()
The node with which the arc information is defined is obtained.
An arc type element or simple type element is returned as the node with which the arc information is defined.
Returns:
The node with which the arc information is defined is returned.

getArcrole

public java.lang.String getArcrole()
The arcrole attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
The arcrole attribute value is returned.
If no arcrole attribute is defined, a empty string is returned.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
The title attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
The title attribute value is returned.
If no title attribute is defined, a empty string is returned.

getShow

public short getShow()
The show attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
A constant corresponding to the show attribute value is returned. Constants correspond to show attribute values as follows:
  • Arc.SHOW_UNKNOWN
  • Arc.SHOW_EMBED
  • Arc.SHOW_REPLACE
  • Arc.SHOW_NEW
  • Arc.SHOW_OTHER
  • Arc.SHOW_NONE

getActuate

public short getActuate()
The actuate attribute value is obtained.
Returns:
A constant corresponding to the actuate attribute value is returned.
Constants correspond to actuate attribute values as follows:
  • Arc.ACTUATE_UNKNOWN
  • Arc.ACTUATE_ONLOAD
  • Arc.ACTUATE_ONREQUEST
  • Arc.ACTUATE_OTHER
  • Arc.ACTUATE_NONE

getFrom

public java.lang.String getFrom()
The label indicating the link start resource is obtained.
The arc type element from attribute value is returned.
Returns:
The label indicating the link start resource is returned.
If no arc type element from attribute is specified, a empty string is returned.

getTo

public java.lang.String getTo()
The label indicating the link ending resource is obtained.
The arc type element to attribute value is returned.
Returns:
The label indicating the link ending resource is returned.
If no arc type element to attribute value is specified, a empty string is returned.

getTitleList

public TitleList getTitleList()
A title information list is obtained.
The title information list held in arc information is returned.
Title information held in the title information list is information about a title type element that is an arc type element child element.
Returns:
The title information list is returned.
If no corresponding title information is present, a empty list is returned.

isDuplicatedArc

public boolean isDuplicatedArc(Arc in)
Arc information is compared to other arc information.
The pair comprising the label indicating the link start resource (arc type element from attribute value) and the label indicating the link ending resource (arc type element to attribute value) in arc information is compared to that in other arc information.
Parameters:
in - Arc information to be compared.
Returns:
The comparison result is returned.
true:
There is no difference between the resource label pairs.
false:
There is a difference between the resource label pairs.
